author: ajaquith
msg: Captcha interface gains an isEnabled() method to allow SpamProtect tag to check whether the CAPTCHA is operational before generating output. This is required in stand-alone or testing scenarios where an outbound network connection cannot be assumed.

author: gdusbabek
msg: Refactor DatabaseDescriptor to isolate the code that establishes the keyspaces and column families. Patch by Gary Dusbabek, reviewed by Eric Evans.  CASSANDRA-819

author: bergmark
msg: [OWB-298] Remove java.io.Serializable from the list of Decorated types in Decorator Util.  The init method of WebBeansDecorator already does so.
